Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring all children with an individualized education program to be transported in buses with air-conditioning
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring all children with an individualized education program to be transported in buses with air-conditioning.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to provide information on establishing afterschool programs
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of education to provide information on establishing afterschool programs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to create a website for schools to list surplus school supplies to be claimed for use by other schools
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of education to create a website for schools to list surplus school supplies to be claimed for use by other schools.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to report on the number of District 75 students and the criteria used to determine the location of District 75 schools
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of education to report on the number of District 75 students and the criteria used to determine the location of District 75 schools.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Department of Education to create a Jewish Heritage Day in New York City public schools.

Items.MatterName: Department of Education to create a Jewish Heritage Day in New York City public schools.
